product_name: Origin-8 Propulsion Wireless Cycle Computer - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're prepping for a race or simply interested in measuring your cycling more closely, the Origin-8 Propulsion Wireless Cycle Computer offers essential training information for any ride. Offers current, average and maximum speed, current average and max cadence, trip distance, total distance, estimated calories burned, air temperature and more. Great for switching from road bikes to mountain bikes, 2 bike settings offer individual and combined odometers so you can transfer it from 1 bike to another. Backlight; requires 1 CR 2032 battery, included. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're prepping for a race or simply interested in measuring your cycling more closely, the Origin-8 Propulsion Wireless Cycle Computer offers essential training information for any ride.
